node.text: What do you want to ask or share?

Icon for Regular People & Their Amazing Stories Regular People & Their Amazing Stories·Follow Posted by Richard Strachan · 1y “Tonight I frustrated someone while driving. They followed me to the gas station and had a few choice words for me. I was really unsure what I did wrong. I began ask if he was ok and what was wrong and if there was anything I can do to make him less angry. He stormed off and I wished him a good day.… Read more Upvote Downvote 1,613 comments 339 shares More

node.content-desc: Icon for Regular People & Their Amazing Stories

node.text: Icon for Regular People & Their Amazing Stories

“Tonight I frustrated someone while driving. They followed me to the gas station and had a few choice words for me. I was really unsure what I did wrong. I began ask if he was ok and what was wrong and if there was anything I can do to make him less angry. He stormed off and I wished him a good day.

node.content-desc: Uber Eats notification: You’re so close to getting your favorite foods
